attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chichester HMRC office has been earmarked for closure.This office has provided a high level of service in both quality and quantity to all of it's customers.The result of this closure will impact on the local community,it's customers and the staff.This closure and it's work being moved to Scotland will mean customers will have the prospect of lengthy waits getting through to call centres.It's staff have built up over a 1000 years service and knowledge between them now face leaving HMRC.Does this benefit the customer?It will also mean loss of trade to local bussinesses from staff and the office's customers.The local council receives £30,000 through carparking alone from staff.With the closure of St Richards,staff reductions in WSCC and other govt offices Chichester is becoming a ghost town.If do not wish this to happen please sign our petition.
